forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Clear then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after midnight. Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a mainly sunny sky, creating a canvas of muted light that dances softly across the city's iconic contours. With temperatures hovering near a comfortable 64 degrees, there's a gentle warmth infused by a light west-southwest breeze, hinting at the approaching evening in which numbers will dip to about 50. As the day wears on, one might sense a slight yet palpable humidity, a whisper of drizzle anticipated post-midnight. 

For now, the prevailing clarity invites you outdoors. Perhaps a leisurely stroll along the waterfront would be delightful, where the ballad of waves plays a soothing tune against the background of the bay. As you plan your outing, dress in layers to accommodate the dynamic San Francisco atmosphere—a light jacket is wise for the evening chill. Engage with the city’s rich tapestry: enjoy coffee at an outdoor café or explore a quiet nook in a nearby park. Today’s serenity, punctuated by just a hint of impending drizzles, crafts a rare harmony within the urban soundscape—an invitation to appreciate the simple pleasures of life in this unique corner of the world.
